property.name: link
property.label: Link
property.description: Link in Markdown format; url is not relevant for button renderings.

property.name: cstyle
property.label: Colour style
property.description: Colour theme style used for rendering.

property.name: rendering
property.label: Rendering
property.description: HTML element used to render the link.

property.name: type
property.label: Type
property.description: Type attribute used if rendered as a button.

property.name: disabled
property.label: Disabled
property.description: Render button as disabled, only revelant with button rendering.

property.name: iconStyle
property.label: Icon style
property.description: Indicates whether there is an icon and where.

property.name: iconName
property.label: Icon name
property.description: Name of the icon in the Google Material collection.

property.name: mobileFullWidth
property.label: Mobile full width
property.description: Setting this attribute will render the button in full width on smaller devices.

property.name: className
property.label: Class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied.
